column1: What are you up to today?
Did you see the latest episode of the show?
I just finished a great book. I think you'd like it!
What's the weather like over there?
Have you heard the new album by Taylor Swift?
Are you going to Emma's party this weekend?
I can't believe how fast this year is going!
Do you have any plans for the summer holidays?
